main.name: Sarwar Saif
main.description: A creative, data-driven and self-motivated person who always passionate about learning cutting-edge technologies and solving real-world problems with proficient marketing and communication skills.
main.bio: I have completed my graduation from Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology in Computer Science and Engineering background in July 2019 with a strong background in coding and development skills. I'm from Dhaka, Bangladesh. I have helped to develop two award-winning projects. One is an online learning management system named Amar iSchool and another one is an android mobile app named Pregnancy Health care which was for pregnant mothers. I have done my undergraduate thesis under  Asst. Prof. Dr Nusrat Sharmin and I published a paper on Automatic Human Brain Segmentation in ICCIT 2019. After my graduation, I started my own company named Pioneer Alpha Ltd which aims to solve major problems in Bangladesh through IT solutions. I love working with Python and JavaScript. I have created many projects using Java, PHP, JavaScript, Python, C#. I have created websites using PHP, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, MySql, MongoDB, Servlet. I'm currently working on my machine learning skills to create intelligent web applications.
main.contactmessage: Please send your message if you have any inquiry.Thank you!
